title: Exponentiation: H20 Molecule
subtitle: Exponentiation Function of H20 Molecule
description: This notebook demonstrates Hamiltonian simulation using Classiq's exponentiation function. It builds a circuit that approximates e^{-iH} for the H2O qubit Hamiltonian (551 Pauli strings on 12 qubits), showcasing the strength of the Classiq chemistry application and exponentiation module.
